title: "Why The Explosion Of LLM Usage Will Drive An Increased Need For NLP"
excerpt: "One likely, if unexpected, side effect of this increased usage of LLMs to wrangle the ocean of unstructured data (as much as 90% of a company's data is unstructured) is that natural language processing (NLP) engines will become more important than ever."
